long_instructions.2-3 Artist 4: Āwhinatia mai te hanganga o te whare mō tēnei ngeru.
long_instructions.2-3 Artist Free Play: He tākaro-herekore! Tāngia tāu e pai ai.
long_instructions.2-3 Artist Nested Loops 10: Koromekehia tēnei waehere kia 12 ngā e oti pai ai te tauira.
long_instructions.2-3 Artist Nested Loops 12: Koromekehia tēnei waehere kia 12 ngā wā e oti pai ai ngā tōrinorino.
long_instructions.2-3 Artist Nested Loops Free Play: He tākaro here-kore, tāngia tētahi mea rawe ki ētahi koromeke tauroto.
long_instructions.2-3 Bee Loops 3A: Whakamahia tētahi koromeke ‘tōai’ hei kohi i te katoa o te waihonga.
long_instructions.4-5 Artist Free Draw 1: Tā kore here! Tāngia tāu e wawatahia nei.
long_instructions.4-5 Artist Patterns 7: Me whakarerekē i te waehere nō tērā atu panga kia waihanga mai i tēnei tauira uaua ake. Tirohia ināianei ngā wāhi e inaki ana ngā taimana, whakamātauria te "peke whakamuri" tuatahi mai i te 100 ki te 50 (haurua noa iho) - he pēhea ināianei te tawhiti o tā te rehetoi "peke whakamuri" tuarua?
long_instructions.CourseD_Dance_2020_05:
_E rere ana tātou inaianei!_

Tāpiri atu he paraka <xml><block type="Dancelab_atTimestamp"><title name="TIMESTAMP">6</title><title name="UNIT">"measures"</title></block></xml> ki te papamahi. Tukua te kaikanikani kia māhia he nekehanga hou a muri i ngā wāhanga e 6.
long_instructions.CourseD_Dance_2020_10: Ka mau te wehi! Hangaia he kanikani ki te tohatoha atu ki o hoa.
long_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_01:
_Me kanikani tatou!_

Kumea te paraka 'he mea hou' ki te papamahi, me tapiri atu ki roto i te paraka 'tatunga' ki te hanga to kaikanikani tuatahi.

_Mena e pirangi ana he whakamarama, he wero ano me pawhiri atu te rama ki te taha maui._
long_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_02:
Me tuku tenei Moose kia kanikani!

Kumea i te paraka <xml><block type="Dancelab_changeMoveLR" block-text="new_dancer do floss"><title name="SPRITE">new\_dancer</title><title name="MOVE" config="MOVES.Dab, MOVES.Drop, MOVES.Floss">Floss</title><title name="DIR">-1</title></block></xml> ki te papamahi. Tapiri ki raro i te paraka takunetanga <xml><block type="Dancelab_atTimestamp" block-text="after 4 measures"><title name="TIMESTAMP">4</title><title name="UNIT">"measures"</title></block></xml>. kia timata to kanikani hou a muri i nga wahanga e wha.

Ko te **Wahanga** he mea hei kaute te wa o te waiata. ki roto i tenei tūāhua e wha nga taki te roa o ia wahanga.
long_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_03:
_E kanikani ana tatou inaianei!_

Tapiri atu he paraka takunetanga <xml><block type="Dancelab_atTimestamp" block-text="after 6 measures"><title name="TIMESTAMP">6</title><title name="UNIT">"measures"</title></block></xml> ki te papamahi. Kia timata te kaikanikani he nekehanga hou a muri i te wahanga tuaono.
long_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_04:
_Me tapiritia he he mea hei kinaki i te kanikani!_

Kimihia he paraka hou hei tapiri atu he papamuri. Me āta matakitaki, ka tinihia te papamuri ki te taki o te waiata!
long_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_05:
Tapiri atu he paraka hou ki te tīni te nekehanga o to kaikanikani **ia wahanga e rua**!

-   Ki te kōwhirihia i te '(Muri atu)', '(Mua iho)', me te '(tupurangi)' ka mohio ai te kaikanikani ki te tīni tona nekehanga ia wa ka whakahaerehia te waehere.
long_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_06:
_E hiahia ana matou kia nui atu nga kaikanikani!_

Hangaia he kaikanikani ā muri me whakaingoatia `Kaikanikani-ā-muri1` ki te kanikani kotahi ki Ngeru.
long_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_08:
He _tuahua_ ta ia kaikanikani. ko tana mahi ko te whiriwhiri i tona ahuatanga.

Mena ka tinihia te _rahi_ ki te iti, ko te āhua kei muri rātou e kanikani ana ki te papamuri. Ka tae e koe ki te waehere ngā kaikanikani o muri kia orite o raua rahi?
long_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_09:
He ahuatanga "tae" ta ia kaikanikani. Na tēnei ahuatanga ka tinihia te tae o te kaikanikani.

-   Na tēnei ka tinihia te tae ki tōu ake hiahia.
long_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_10:
E mohio ana mātau pewhea te tini ngā ahuatanga o ngā kaikanikani. Ka taea hōki tātou ki te māhia ngā ahuatanga i tēnei paraka, kia timata i te wa ka tangi te waiata:
<xml>
  <block type="Dancelab_startMapping" block-text="right_unicorn begins following bass">
    <title name="SPRITE">right\_unicorn</title>
    <title name="PROPERTY">"scale"</title>
    <title name="RANGE">"bass"</title>
  </block></xml>
long_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_11:
Ko te mahi o te paraka tauwhāinga hei whakahaere i te waehere ia wa ka pehi te pātuhi kōpere o runga.

Tēnā pea ka tinihia te nekehanga, ka tinihia ngā momo ahuatanga. Kia auaha o mahi. Me tirohia kia kitea he paraka hou!
long_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_11_5:
Tiro atu ki tēnei paraka:

<xml>
  <block type="Dancelab_makeNewDanceSpriteGroup" block-text="Make 6 new ducks in a circle">
    <title name="N">6</title>
    <title name="COSTUME">"DUCK"</title>
    <title name="LAYOUT">"circle"</title>
  </block></xml>

Inaianei ka tae e koe ki te hanga kia maha ngā kaikanikani i te wa kotahi!
Me whakamahia te paraka "rakiraki katoa" kia kanikani kotahi ai ngā rakiraki katoa.
long_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_11b:
He whakataetae kanikani! Ka dab te ngeru ia wa ka pehi i te patuhi kōpere māui. Ka "drop" te Karetao ia wa ka pehi te patuhi kōpere mātau, ka "pakipaki" ia wa ka pehi te pātuhi kōpere o runga.

**whakamahia te Karetao kia drop, pakipaki, drop, pakipaki kia tere rawa atu!**
long_instructions.CourseD_Dance_Party_12: Ka mau te wehi! Hangaia he kanikani ki te tohatoha atu ki o hoa.
long_instructions.CourseE_HOC 2018 Level_1: Me kohia nga momo whakarato mo te rerenga. Tikina he **waka** ![](https://images.code.org/0b3162de9dc0abf3e0890d315b8cc699-image-1538697977747.png) mai i te **papa** ![](https://images.code.org/e0cf43fd36a50dd16ee06595047bfd8f-image-1538697999418.png).
long_instructions.CourseE_HOC 2018 Level_10: E huna ana tetahi **wheke** ![](https://images.code.org/82f305ab1cb4a9ff9044991a18edb16e-image-1538947827218.png) ki tenei wāhi Whakamaharatanga Moana, ka āhei e koe te kimi?

Na tena ka timata ai te **roma**![](https://images.code.org/7773cf30f42e6727a23c8cb364d4664b-image-1538699800030.png) kua oti to wero!

  </block></xml>

Tēnā pea ka tini koe ngā nekehanga, te āhua o te kaikanikani, tēnā pea he nekehanga tere. Kei a koe!

<xml>

long_instructions.course4_artist_fwp_challenge1: Whakamātauria tēnei papatono, ā, panonihia kia kitea ka aha. E mārama ana ki a koe te whakamahinga? (Mukua rānei, ā, whakakapia me tētahi mea rerekē noa atu)
long_instructions.courseC_artist_loopsPrePre1a_2019:
Kei te hē te wāhi tū a te rehetoi!  

Whakamahia te paraka <xml><block type="jump_to_xy" id="callMe" block-text="jump to 200 over 200 down"><title name="XPOS">200</title><title name="YPOS">200</title></block></xml> ki te whakaneke i te rehetoi ki waenga i te wāhi tākaro.\
Kātahi, tuhia he rārangi kia 50 pika te roa mā te paraka <xml><block type="draw_move_by_constant" block-text="move forward"><title name="DIR">moveForward</title><title name="VALUE">50</title></block></xml>.
long_instructions.courseC_artist_loopsPrePre1a_2020:
Kei te hē te wāhi tū a te rehetoi!  

Whakamahia te paraka <xml><block type="jump_to_xy" id="callMe" block-text="jump to 200 over 200 down"><title name="XPOS">200</title><title name="YPOS">200</title></block></xml> ki te whakaneke i te rehetoi ki waenga i te wāhi tākaro.\
Kātahi, tuhia he rārangi kia 50 pika te roa mā te paraka <xml><block type="draw_move_by_constant" block-text="move forward"><title name="DIR">moveForward</title><title name="VALUE">50</title></block></xml>.
long_instructions.courseC_maze_debugging9_2020: Whakamahia ngā paraka o te pouaka taputapu ki te waihanga i tō papatono. Tukua a Scrat ki te haere ki te kākano.
long_instructions.courseD_maze_nestedLoops4:
Aratakina au ki putiputirā mā ngā paraka rua rua noa iho. \
\
Whakamātauria tētahi koromeke ‘tōai’ ki roto i tētahi atu kia heke iho mai te nui o te waehere e whakamahia ana.

long_instructions.frozen circle:
He āhua mīharo te porohita. Ka āhei koe te matapae 
ko tēhea tau ka tuhia hei whakakapi i ngā tohu pātai ki te tā porohita?
